channel.title: Abouts on Jayesh Nair
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Jayesh Nair

item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a full-time student pursuing Masters in AI & Autonomous Systems at Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt. Previously I used to work as a Solution’s Engineer at Minto.ai and had earned a bachelors in Mechanical Engineering from Pune, India.

I have a deep interest in making computer’s “see” things, along with the “tools” that make them see such as traditional camera’s, event based camera’s, light-field systems etc. I am constantly on the lookout for opportunities to work on the same.
